attributes.action: make funds available so that the british public can  start an adopt-a-squaddie scheme?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our miltary is  not valued by society
our government should set up some kind of scheme where the british public can adopt a squaddie scheme 

Pick a soldier, write to him or her, get news about what they're doing, photos etc ,send him or her little *gifts , make them feel appreciated, be a part of their lives, always good for morale,  this could  be organised  by  something, along the lines of "Send letters to BFPO xxx , And the soldiers in charge could give them out to other soldiers . The boys and girls could them mix and match till they found a correspondent they were happy talking with?

The fact is, society can't value our soldiers  until they can be  become more accessible to to the british public via the m.o.d .
